title: Que Mala for El Bala: Alejandro Valverde’s First US Gravel Race is Foiled by a Flat
content:
The former road world champ got way behind at Belgian Waffle Ride California after he struggled to fix a flat 10 miles into the race.

Read the full article at Que Mala for El Bala: Alejandro Valverde’s First US Gravel Race is Foiled by a Flat on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
